content.text:
# Yogeshwari Mahavidyalaya

Yogeshwari Mahavidyalaya, also known as Yogeshwari College of Science, is an undergraduate and postgraduate, coeducational college situated in Ambajogai, Beed district, Maharashtra. It was established in the year 1935. Yogeshwari education society founder is Swami Ramanand Teerth,
*The college is affiliated with Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Marathwada University.
Departments
Science
*Physics
*Mathematics
*Chemistry
*Electronics
*Botany
*Microbiology
*Zoology
*Computer Science
*Dairy Science
*polytechnic
Accreditation
The college is  recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC).
